title: lib/spack/env/cc wrapper bug: fails with -Wl,-rpath was not followed by -Wl,*
body:
Recent change has caused the build for Dire to fail. This package used to build
https://github.com/gartung/cmssw-spack/blob/master/packages/dire/package.py

Exact spot where command dies is here

https://github.com/spack/spack/blame/develop/lib/spack/env/cc#L312

This is probably because dire-config set -Wl,rpath in the expected format.

Error occurs in this Makefile rule
```
DIRE_CONFIG_BIN=$(PREFIX_BIN)/dire-config
DIRE_CONFIG=`$(DIRE_CONFIG_BIN) --all-libs`

 dire : $$@.cc
   @echo "Default compilation with ''$(CXX) $^ -o $@ $(DIRE_CONFIG)''"
   $(CXX) $^ -o $@ $(DIRE_CONFIG)
```

Actual command leading up to error

[gartung@gartung DIRE-2.002]$ make install
...
make[1]: Entering directory `/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/dire-2.002-jivaipbvdi25br24jquf6nf72njv7ce4/share/Dire/main'
Default compilation with ''/data/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ dire.cc -o dire -I/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pythia8-230-cnciwzu5xghtuyuyn5eyvfgstlegmjd3/include -L/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pythia8-230-cnciwzu5xghtuyuyn5eyvfgstlegmjd3/lib -Wl,-rpath /data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pythia8-230-cnciwzu5xghtuyuyn5eyvfgstlegmjd3/lib -lpythia8 -I/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/hepmc-2.06.09-52wphusnx5xi3zsyuduy43yf72xwezol/include -L/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/hepmc-2.06.09-52wphusnx5xi3zsyuduy43yf72xwezol/lib -Wl,-rpath /data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/hepmc-2.06.09-52wphusnx5xi3zsyuduy43yf72xwezol/lib -lHepMC -DHEPMC2 -I/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/lhapdf-6.2.1-75ygknjvgavbuccoukvq5a277ueiypz5/include -L/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/lhapdf-6.2.1-75ygknjvgavbuccoukvq5a277ueiypz5/lib -Wl,-rpath /data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/lhapdf-6.2.1-75ygknjvgavbuccoukvq5a277ueiypz5/lib -lLHAPDF -DLHAPDF6 -I/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/dire-2.002-jivaipbvdi25br24jquf6nf72njv7ce4/include -L/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/dire-2.002-jivaipbvdi25br24jquf6nf72njv7ce4/lib -Wl,-rpath /data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/dire-2.002-jivaipbvdi25br24jquf6nf72njv7ce4/lib -ldire -ldl -O2 -std=c++98 -pedantic -W -Wall -Wshadow -fPIC''
/data/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++ dire.cc -o dire `/data/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/dire-2.002-jivaipbvdi25br24jquf6nf72njv7ce4/bin/dire-config --all-libs`
-Wl,-rpath was not followed by -Wl,*
